item.title: Recommended Privacy Resources
item.category: "Recommended Privacy Resources" , "Privacy Rights" , "Identity Theft Protection" , "Digital Security" , "Cyber Criminals" , "Mass Surveillance" , "Personal Data Protection" , "Family Privacy" , "Children's Privacy" , "Teens' Privacy" , "Digital Security Hygiene" , "Credit Report" , "Credit Freeze" , "Defensive Computing Checklist" , "Personal Data Removal" , "Fraud Reporting" , "Privacy Services" , "Information Masking" , "Account Management" , "GDPR Requests" , "Account Deletion"
item.description: Discover recommended privacy resources for protecting your rights, family, and personal information, including identity theft protection, digital security, and privacy rights, to stay safe from cyber criminals and mass surveillance.
